reviews.review_msg: she's alright, she seems to know what she's talking about, you just need the will, you have to want to get a decent grade and apply yourself

Students (like me) who were in french immersion won't find the class too challenging; not so much if you know minimal french. She's really nice and sweet, but she can be really confusing at times. Also the material she chooses to discuss are really pointless and boring.
